input.sentences: in the mornings | [female] leaves her house to volunteer and teach .
she passes many stores on her way around town .
sometimes there is a lot of traffic .
when she finally gets to her church where she teaches | she is happy .
her students wait for her to arrive | so they they can begin to study .
output.sentences: Down the long stairway she went.
And down to the bus stop.
The bus was finally there to get her.
Her school was the second stop on the bus line.
She made it to class before the tardy bell rang.
